Class DatabaseConnectionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.controller.DatabaseConnectionData

  • public class DatabaseConnectionData
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseConnectionData class responsible for config file reading and setup the required params for the connection.
